column5: I was looking at the ones from Spring creek and was wondering if anyones knows where to pick them up in our neck of the woods. 2.tiff
SCOTTY makes them for kayaks and I believe canoes too.  But I'm pretty sure you'd need to order them.

I cheaped out and made my own after having a heart attack when I saw how much they were charging for them....  Here's a post I made about how I did it... http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/index.p...t=0#entry101009
I have a home made pontoon may brother and I made for my canoe out of ABS pipe, works great. Where abouts do you live? I'm willing to sell it if you are looking for a cheap alternative.
Diltsy:  do you have any pictures of it?
